txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Broken wood spears from the Orcs to the west of Esteldín. Deliver the items to Ferrif within Esteldín.
'Good work, there are fewer of them capable of harming the people of the North Downs. Thank you.'

'There are Orcs everywhere throughout the North Downs. A large encampment to the south is digging in, but it is the rogue groups to the west that threaten the people there. Snap their weapons and return them to me here.'
Rangers of Esteldín Task: Broken Wood Spears
Ferrif, a Ranger, has asked for a collection of broken wood spears to be delivered to him at the Ranger's home at Esteldín.
Deliver the broken wood spears to Ferrif in Esteldín
You have accepted a task to collect broken wood spears from the Orcs in the area surrounding Esteldín to the west. Once collected, you are to deliver the items to Ferrif within Esteldín.
Wanted: Broken wood spears from the Orcs to the west of Esteldín.
